attributes.action: I no longer have confidence in either this government or parliament.
attributes.background: The referendum result was not categorical at 48/52.  Since then, we have had our eyes opened about the reality of leaving the EU.  This Prime Minister, Government and overall lower house of Parliament are not representative of the people.  Whatever the answer, lets start again.

rejection.details:
If you would like another general election you might like to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235480
